text: muttakiderake ye jannatera pratisruti deya hayeche tara drstanta: Tate ache nirmala panira naharasamuha, ache dudhera naharasamuha yara sbada aparibartaniya, ache panakaridera jan'ya susbadu surara naharasamuha, ache parisodhita madhura naharasamuha [1] ebam sekhane tadera jan'ya thakabe pratyeka prakarera phalamula. Ara tadera rabera paksa theke ksama. Tara (muttakira) ki tadera n'yaya yara jahanname sthayi habe ebam yaderake pana karano habe phutanta pani, phale ta tadera naribhumri chinna-bicchinna kare dibe
